China cancels premier's press conference for first time since 1993China's Premier Li Qiang will not hold a press conference after the close of this year's annual parliamentary meeting, an official said on Monday, ending a tradition maintained for three decades. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:48:26 GMT W73DOSAV4JOSNGRD5GYST4KZCU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-cancels-premier-press-conference-for-first-time-since-1993-2024-03-04/Liz Lee, Albee Zhang世界中国
National security trial of Hong Kong media tycoon Jimmy Lai: what's happened so farHong Kong media tycoon and pro-democracy advocate Jimmy Lai is on trial accused of endangering China's national security. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:41:11 GMT YJFTKQV4XNIOHNMZLUEUKSNWGM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/national-security-trial-hong-kong-media-tycoon-jimmy-lai-what-happened-so-far-2024-03-04/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界亚太地区
Morning Bid: Looming event risk can't stop Nikkei topping 40,000A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 05:33:21 GMT XIG6QXPOGZI3PDIRNJCAATTROY https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/global-markets-view-europe-2024-03-04/Reuters市场欧洲市场
China opposes using anti-espionage law to attack its business environmentChina opposes any attempt to denigrate or attack its business environment by misreading the country's counter-espionage law, National People's Congress (NPC) spokesman Lou Qinjian told reporters at a press conference on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 05:22:55 GMT M3JBDA7CFZIIPHF4VX3WZDEHZE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-opposes-using-anti-espionage-law-attack-its-business-environment-2024-03-04/Reuters世界中国
China to hold 2024 parliamentary meeting from March 5-11China's National People's Congress (NPC), or parliament, will hold its annual meeting in Beijing from March 5 to March 11, NPC spokesman Lou Qinjian told reporters at a news conference on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:14:06 GMT HTV66OXADBM2HEWIZCUOJVB46Y https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-holds-2024-parliamentary-meeting-march-5-11-2024-03-04/Reuters世界中国
China's BYD prices new version of best-selling EV lower than predecessorChina's leading electric vehicle (EV) maker BYD on Monday launched a new version of its best-selling car at a price lower than the final price of its discontinued predecessor, as a price war rages in the world's largest automobile market. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 03:12:30 GMT QLFCPJT6F5L3BAV6IC7IEFENPE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-bid-prices-new-version-best- sell-even-lower-than-predecessor-2024-03-04/Reuters商业汽车与交通
